attributes.action: Remember that the government are the servants of the people and not a law unto themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have had no say on "The Human Rights Bill" which seems to serve all but decent law abiding "Humans". Nor do we have any say on MPs' wages pensions etc, all of which should reflect their ability to do a good job (In which case they would all currently be destitute!)
The ENGLISH (yes we still exist) should have a say in how our country is governed and the MPs of the day should listen and do what is required of them.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
